name: Wizards Vs. Lizards
description:
It has been centuries since the Great War ended… Wizard civilization is at its peak and magic flows freely throughout the Kingdom. However, all may not be as it seems… 

Project: Containment has been breached! The very foundation of Wizard supremacy has begun to crumble as Lizard warriors have somehow broken through the Golem Defense Network, a vast underground web of arcane constructs and traps that has kept Lizard kind confined to the depths of the earth. 

For Lizards, now is the time for freedom! An ancient power, long dormant, has begun to awaken within a new generation of Lizard warriors. This power, once thought to have gone extinct with the slaying of the last Dragon Queen, has resurfaced. Could the Lizard Sages have found another Dragon egg after all these years? Will the Wizards contain or eradicate this new threat?

Welcome to Wizards vs. Lizards!

Designed by Chase Mitchell & Maxx Srinivasan
